Package org.apache.commons.math4.ml.neuralnet.sofm.util

Miscellaneous utilities.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ExponentialDecayFunction
    Exponential decay function: a e-x / b, where x is the (integer) independent variable.
    ExponentialDecayFunctionTest
    Tests for ExponentialDecayFunction class
    QuasiSigmoidDecayFunction
    Decay function whose shape is similar to a sigmoid.
    QuasiSigmoidDecayFunctionTest
    Tests for QuasiSigmoidDecayFunction class
